00091 #define BYTE_ORDER_MAGIC        (0x11223344)
00092 
00097 #if (__BIG_ENDIAN__)
00098 #define REVERSE_SENSE_SWAP_INT16(x)  x = ( (((x)<<8)&0x0000ff00) | (((x)>>8)&0x00ff) )
00099 #define REVERSE_SENSE_SWAP_INT32(x)  x = ( (((x)<<24)&0xff000000) | (((x)<<8)&0x00ff0000) | \
00100                          (((x)>>8)&0x0000ff00) | (((x)>>24)&0x000000ff) )
00101 #else
00102 #define REVERSE_SENSE_SWAP_INT16(x)
00103 #define REVERSE_SENSE_SWAP_INT32(x)
00104 
00105 #endif
